projectMetadata.name: Compliance Platform Landing Pages
notes: This PRD is intentionally separate from the main product PRD.json.
Goal: ship two static landing pages + waitlist capture + calendar link.
Implementation: Astro static site deployed to Netlify.
Keep this lean. No Shopify API. No backend. No database.

progressTracking.rule: After completing each feature, update PRD.landing.json and append a dated entry to progress.landing.txt.

euMerchant.rationale: Low-friction email capture suits small merchants exploring compliance tooling.

midMarket.rationale: Mid-market buyers expect a sales conversation before committing.

conversionObjective.rule: Each landing page has exactly one primary CTA. All sections on the page should support driving visitors toward that action. Avoid exploratory navigation that pulls visitors away from conversion.

engineering: All routes load directly by URL

features.title: Initialize Astro landing project
features.goal: Create minimal Astro static site ready for Netlify deployment.
tasks: Create new landing repo or ./landing directory
Add README with dev + deploy instructions
verification: npm run dev starts Astro dev server

features.title: Create site routes
features.goal: Add required pages and shared layout.

features.title: EU merchant landing copy
features.goal: Conversion-focused messaging for Shopify merchants selling physical products into the EU..
tasks: Hero section with clear problem + CTA
verification: Primary CTA visible above the fold

features.title: Mid-market landing copy
features.goal: Credibility-focused messaging for mid-market brands.

features.title: Implement Netlify Forms
features.goal: Capture leads without backend.
verification: Forms detected by Netlify after deploy
Test submission appears in Netlify dashboard

features.title: Calendar integration
features.goal: Ensure calendar link visible and consistent.
tasks: Add calendar CTA above the fold on both landing pages
verification: All calendar links use configured URL
At least one booking CTA visible without scrolling

features.title: Responsive layout
features.goal: Mobile-first clean layout optimized for conversion.
verification: Buttons easy to tap on mobile

features.title: SEO and metadata
features.goal: Add basic SEO and social sharing metadata.
verification: Meta tags present in page source

features.title: Privacy baseline
features.goal: Minimal compliance for collecting emails.
tasks: Add Privacy Policy link in footer
Add short data usage note near forms
verification: Privacy link visible on all pages
Form includes clear data usage notice

features.title: Netlify deployment configuration
features.goal: Ensure successful Netlify deploy.
tasks: Add netlify.toml with build command and publish directory
Ensure all routes load directly by URL
verification: Direct URL access works for all routes

features.title: Lean quality checks
features.goal: Prevent shipping broken landing page.
tasks: Ensure clean build on fresh install
Optional: add simple Playwright smoke test for route loading
verification: npm run build succeeds in clean environment

features.title: Post-launch checklist
features.goal: Ensure lead capture works after deploy.
verification: Test lead visible in Netlify dashboard

features.title: Minimal CI build check (GitHub Actions)
features.goal: Prevent broken builds from being deployed to Netlify.
tasks: Configure workflow to run on pull_request and push to main
Steps: npm ci, npm run build
Optional: add astro check or lint step
verification: Build fails if npm run build fails
No coverage requirements or complex pipeline logic

features.title: Dependabot (weekly, grouped, low-noise)
features.goal: Keep dependencies reasonably up to date without creating churn.
tasks: Group dependency updates into a single PR
verification: Dependabot opens at most one grouped PR per week
Can be disabled easily if noisy

features.title: Explicit Conversion Objective
features.goal: Define a single primary conversion goal for the landing page to avoid distraction and scope creep.
tasks: Define primary CTA as waitlist signup or calendar booking
Remove or avoid top navigation links that distract from conversion
Ensure all sections support conversion clarity
verification: Page messaging consistently drives toward conversion

features.title: Hero Restructure for 5-Second Clarity
features.goal: Ensure visitors understand who the product is for, what problem it solves, and what to do next within 5 seconds.
tasks: Replace hero headline with outcome-driven statement
Ensure logo is present but not visually overpowering
verification: CTA is the strongest visual element above the fold

features.title: Intentional Layout and Spacing
features.goal: Improve visual hierarchy so the page feels deliberate rather than placeholder.
tasks: Establish clear heading scale (H1, H2, H3)
Constrain body text width to readable range

features.title: Introduce Single Accent Color
features.goal: Add one accent color to improve intentionality while maintaining minimal design.
tasks: Apply accent color only to primary CTA and hover state
Ensure accessibility contrast meets WCAG AA
verification: Exactly one accent color used consistently

features.title: Add 3-Step How-It-Works Section
features.goal: Explain product flow simply to reduce cognitive friction.
tasks: Limit each step to short title and one sentence
verification: Clear logical flow from step 1 to step 3

features.title: Outcome-Based Benefits Section
features.goal: Shift messaging from features to business outcomes to increase relevance.
tasks: Add section titled 'Why it matters' or equivalent
Frame benefits in business impact terms
verification: No references to dashboards, APIs, or integrations
Benefits emphasize risk reduction, time savings, or readiness
Section supports conversion rather than exploration

features.title: Add Trust Signal Block
features.goal: Increase perceived legitimacy without overclaiming.
tasks: Add short credibility statement near footer
Avoid exaggerated claims or hype language
verification: Trust signal limited to one short paragraph

features.title: Bottom CTA Reinforcement
features.goal: Reinforce conversion decision at the end of the page.
tasks: Add short reassurance text (e.g., no spam, early access only)
verification: CTA visually strongest element in final section
Section clearly separated from trust block
